name: Escaper
description:
(ENG)You are in a secure facility. You are stuck in test 41 due to an accident. You have to run, if you don't get away, they'll get you. You Don't Know Who They Are. Just Run
(POL)Jesteś w Chroninym obiekcie. Utknąłeś w teście 41 z powodu wypadku. Musisz biec, jeśli nie uciekniesz, dopadną cię. Nie Wiesz Kim Są Poprostu Biegnij

THE GAME IS IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT

Discord: https://discord.gg/cYdgbvby
